1.「これは 大魔王 <pc>様。| ワタクシ しがない作家をしておりマス| <%s:
This is the Great Demon King Hello. My name is <%sL_NPC_NAME> and I'm a|humble writer... I'm afraid I'm writing your|autobiography on your behalf... Yeah... Yes,|
|well, autobiographies of great men are always|interesting... I'd like to ask you a few|questions about that. You've only been known|
|in the Demon Realm for a short time, so|compared to the Great Demon Lords of the|past, you don't have enough episodes for your|
|autobiography. So, I want you to do something|that will make you famous as the Great Demon|King and report it to me! I'll tell you what|
|to do in the form of a request from me... Of|course, if you report back to us, we'll|provide you with a small reward for your|
|coverage...

2.「どうか お引き受け いただけないでショウか？|<yesno><break>: Please, will you take care of this for me?<yesno><break>

3.「さすがは 大魔王となられた お方デス！| そう言ってくださると 思っていまシタ:
I wouldn't expect anything less from the Great|Demon Lord herselfhimself! I knew you'd say that.|
|Here's the current request list you can|tackle.

5.「そうデスか……。| 気が変わりましたら| いつでも お声がけくだサイ。: I see... If you change your mind, please feel|free to let me know.

6.「これは <pc>様。| 自叙伝は 鋭意執筆中で ございマス。| 本日は どのよ: If it isn't Lord <pc>. I'm|hard at work creating your autobiography.|What can I do for you today?|<break>

7.「他に何か ご用件は ございマスか？|<break>: Is there anything else I can do for you?|<break>

8.「おやめになられるのデスね。| では また ご用がございましたら| お声がけくだ: I see. Well, if you need me again, please|let me know.

9.「依頼の状況は だいじなものにある| エピソード依頼帳で 確認できマスので| 達: You can check the status of your requests at|any time by checking the Episode Request Book|in your Key Items.

10.「おお！ ご報告いただけるのデスね！| ご報告は まとめてなさいマスか？|<br: Oh! You have something to report to me? Do|you want to report it all at once?<break>

11.「フムフム……<wait 500> ナルホド……<wait 500>| そんなコ:
Mmm-hmm...I see...|You don't say...|
|Thanks for your report!|Lord 's story was wonderful,|and I can just envision your success!|
|Please accept this as my thanks!

14.「もちものが いっぱいのようデスね。| お礼を お渡ししマスので どうぐかばんを: Looks like you're carrying too many things.|Please rearrange your belongings so I can|give you your reward.

15.「それでは 引き続き| 依頼のご報告を お待ちしておりマス。| よろしくお願いい: I look forward to hearing from you!

16.「お願いした依頼は| すべて 達成されたようデスね。|<bw_break>: It appears that all of your requests have|been completed.<bw_break>

17.「さて 申し訳ないのデスが| 続けて お願いしたい依頼が ございマス。| お引き: Please excuse me, but I have another request.|Will you accept it?|<yesno><break>

18.「おお！ さすがは大魔王となられた お方デス！| それでは……|<bw_brea: I wouldn't expect anything less from the Great|Demon Lord! Now then...<bw_break>

19.「これだけ エピソードがあれば| 充分 続きを書くことが できそうデス！|<bw: With this many episodes, I have much more|material to write about!<bw_break>

20.「書き進めるうちに また 新たなエピソードが| 必要になると思いマスので| しば: I'll be certain to need more episodes to|write about, so please come back again soon!

21.「今のところ お願いしている依頼は| ないようデスね。|<bw_break>: There aren't any new requests at the moment.|<bw_break>

22.「じつは また <pc>様に| お願いしたい依頼が あるのデスが| お願いできる: Actually, Lord <pc>, I have a|request I'd like to ask of you.|<yesno><break>

23.「……達成済みで まだ 報酬を受け取っていない| 依頼があるようデスね。| 先に: ...You have requests that have been|fulfilled, but you haven't been rewarded for|yet. Please report them to me first.|<bw_break>

24.「依頼書を 更新するのデスね。| 今のリストは 上書きされてしまいマスが| よろ: You want to update the request list? If you|do that, the current one will be overwritten.|Is that all right?|<yesno2><break>

25.「今のところ お願いしたい依頼は| お渡ししているもので すべてになりマス。|<:
So far, the requests we've given you are all|we have... New request forms are available|every Sunday morning at 6:00 a.m., so please|
|come back...

27.「今のところ ご報告いただいたエピソードだけで| 充分 続きを書くことが できそ:
So far, the episodes you've reported are|enough for me to continue writing... New|request forms will be available every Sunday|
|morning at 6:00 a.m. Please come back...

28.「何について ご説明いたしまショウ？|<break>: What would you like to talk about, Mr. Shaw?<break>

29.「<pc>様の 自叙伝を 書くために| 大魔王として ハクがつくような| エピソ:
In order to write your autobiography, we'd|like you to create an episode that will make|you look like a demon king. I'll suggest what|
|you should do in the form of a request... I|will also prepare a small reward for each|request that is accomplished... I'm proud to|
|say that I'm one of the best calligraphers in|the world of magic, so please don't worry and|leave it to me... I'll make sure to finish|
|the work to your satisfaction!

30.「依頼をこなすには まず ワタクシから| 依頼書を 受け取ってくだサイ。|<br:
To complete a request, you must first receive|a written request from me... On the request|form, you'll need to fill out five episode|
|requests... All of the episode requests can|be completed at the same time... You may|proceed in any order... When you've completed|
|your requests, please report to me... You can|report back to me separately, or you can|report all of your requests at once. The more|
|episodes we get, the better we'll be able to|make our work, so please help us out!

31.「新しい 依頼書があるときは| 手元のリストを 新しいものに| 更新することがで:
When you have a new requisition, you can|update your list with the new one... Even if|your current list is still in progress, you|
|can update it at any time you like. However,|please note that any uncompleted requests|before the update will be lost. If you have a|
|request that you have already completed,|please report it to us first so we can give|you your reward... Also, if you don't have|
|any new requests you can't update your|list... New requests will be ready once a|week, every Sunday morning at 6:00 a.m.

32.「依頼を ご報告いただければ| 達成した依頼に応じて 報酬をお渡ししマス。|<b:
All you have to do is report a request and|we'll give you a reward based on the request|you complete. Please note that the experience|
|value of the reward will be given to the|occupation when you report it. Of course, if|you come to us in training mode, we can give|
|you training stamps...

36.<pc>は 依頼<%nL_CLEAR_COUNT>件分の 報酬として|特訓スタン: <pc> received <%dL_EXP> Training Stamps|as a reward for <%dL_CLEAR_COUNT> cleared requests!|<se_nots System 7>|<bw_break>

38.「胸が躍るような スバらしいご報告を| お待ちしておりマス！: I'm looking forward to hearing your exciting|stories!

40.「どちらの依頼のお話を| お聞かせいただけマスか？: May I ask which request you're referring to?

41.「お礼の 経験値は| 合計 <%nL_EXP> Pになりマスが| このまま お受: The total amount of experience you've given|me is <%nL_EXP> P. Do you wish to accept it|as is?<yesno><break>

42.「今の職業デスと レベル上限に達しているため| 経験値は お渡しできまセンが|: I can't give you my experience because I've|reached the maximum level for my current|occupation, is that okay?<yesno><break>

43.「お礼の 特訓スタンプは| 合計 <%nL_EXP> 個になりマスが| このまま: You have a total of <%nL_EXP> training|stamps.<yesno><break>

44.「今の職業デスと 特訓スタンプが| 上限に達しているため アイテムのみの| お渡: I've reached the limit for my current|profession and training stamps, so I'll only|be giving you the items.<yesno><break>

45.「かしこまりまシタ！| それでは 早速 お聞かせくだサイ！: Yes, sir! Then tell us about it!

46.「依頼はまだ 継続中のようデスね。| 引き続き よろしくお願いいたしマス！: It seems that the request is still ongoing...|Thank you for your continued support.
